page.title: 16SERVICES DOWNDERRY/SEATON
page.content: { Medical}treatment is available in a local surgery open for two hours most days.For more complex treatment the main surgery at St.Germans must be attended.Nurses and chiropodists visit as required.Dentists serve major towns { Education}there is no school within the block;children under 11 years go to the nearby church school,senior pupils (11+) travel to Torpoint or Looe in the transport provided. {Waste Disposal}A weekly collection of household waste.Two small containers per household are permitted.To reduce the fly-tipping problem,large items will be removed by arrangement.{Other {services}arranged by Caradon as reqd. The groceries,post offices, butchers, pubs and club keep the most needed goods.Consumer durables,clothes,shoes etc.can be delivered.Electricians and builders abound.Plumbers scarce.
